++ Open Source Everything Long Reach Manual Pole Saw


+++ SUMMARY

  * Attach a saw to a long arm paint roller extendable pole for an inexpensive long reach pole saw. 
  * $77 compared to a $350 long reach cutter. 
  * Using a manual cutter on larger branches is hard work though.


+++ PARTS
  * Bahco 14-Inch Pruning Saw with Striking Knife 386-6T.
  * "Mr Long Arm"
